title: Tanks, dans l'enfer des combats
overview: Technical odyssey and epic saga, Tanks, dans l'enfer des combats tells our contemporary story through the evolutions of this steel monster. An instrument of oppression of people and a weapon of liberation of troops, the tank punctuates the great conflicts of our time.Combining technology, economy, geopolitics, military strategy and human adventures, soldiers and veterans tell us the incredible story of tanks.
